title: Fuck LeBlanc
body:
So I've heard this cancer of a champ is getting reworked {{champion:7}} 
Now now
I want to suggest something
Something that would entirely cure all of the world's illnesses 
It will give you a dick the size of Mt.Rushmore
PLEASE 
I don't wanna 
get 70% of my health chunked at level 3
and when I try to farm
WOE TO THOSE WHO ENTER THE LANE OF THE BLANC
WOE TO YOUR MENTALITY FOR YOU WILL BE THROWN INTO A STATE OF CRIPPLING DEPRESSION WHEN YOU REALIZE YOU HAVE NO HOPE

replies.body:
YES YES EVERYONE POUR YOUR ANGER TOWARDS THE BLANC ON THIS PAGE {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 

MOAR I SAY MOARRRRR

> [{quoted}](name=The Locker Gnome,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IBIEArA3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-12T06:14:17.766+0000)
>
> YES YES EVERYONE POUR YOUR ANGER TOWARDS THE BLANC ON THIS PAGE {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 
> 
> MOAR I SAY MOARRRRR

are you ok
He wrote himself in the OP it's hurting his mentality. See? This' what happens when you're too much with LeBlanc. Only proving his point.

I think he hates LeBlanc to the point to spit his hatred on the board.
Like if he can't counters LeBlanc, it's not our problem.
Actually at lvl 3 she can 100-0 you ,if she lands a chain.
How is this possible? I can't imagine this being possible.
it isn't
Maybe with ~10 autos and ignite...
yeah, which is not "100-0". Additionally, many mages could do similar stuff if they hit every spell
well technically it is 100-0, just a very slow one.
well, if you don't trade back, it could be one, but it is not like you are stunned the whole time
what does trading have to do with this? 100-0 means you bring their health to 0 from 100, it doesn't mean player 1 is at 100% health and the other is at 0.
It's very possible with an ignite thrown in there, it's not like you can trade back too because she just tps bk to her minion wave
Then she hasn't killed you, LOL. Dafuq u complaining about?

"I got rekt by Leblanc early game so now I'm going to cry to riot to nerf her"

These are the same people that thought Cinderhulk meta was "healthy"
Most LBs I've seen can never land chains. Which actually worries me more if one does land her chains.

{{champion:7}}  vs {{champion:4}}  at level 3, both with Doran's Ring and LB FULL AP rune page.
Twisted Fate has 703 HP at level 3.
This gives LB 51 AP at level 3.
Leblanc's burst would be
Q: 75.4(x2) W: 110.6 E: 65.5, +110 for a level 3 ignite, and +30 for level 3 Thunderlord's Decree.
Total Damage Dealt: 466.9
Twisted Fate still has 236.1 HP.

If you could squeeze 4 auto attacks in there (they deal 60 each) you could one shot him, but TF likely brought Heal or Barrier to this matchup as it is heavily out of his favor, not to mention magic resist runes.
That's just base damage. You are forgetting the ap scaling and the auto attacks.
I had mentioned no items/runes, but I went ahead and added it for ya.

Literally all you have to do vs leblanc is not die

She's useless after 30 minutes
Dude, you are saying this like... idk.. ''She won't get fed if you don't feed her''..
'The way to not be killed by LB is to not die'

"They live until they die."
{{champion:202}}
The way to not get killed by LeBlanc is to be 601 units away from her. Happy now?
1201 with double dash, and 2151 with chain. Seems fair.

If Leblanc uses double dash to close the gap then she's going to do no damage

It is fair.
>her right in the {{champion:76}}
> her right in the {{champion:107}}
>her right in the {{champion:8}}
You could expect someone called BloodyTompon to post that
I get it, the Vladgina

Leblanc has sooo many issues. I always ban her when I'm mid. 

Her damage is stupid yes, but what I find the worst is how little room you have to do things. Like.. you can't gank her. You can't escape from a gank because her initiation range is bonkers, and she can CC you for her jungler. You can't just let her push you into tower because she will just roam bot. You can't push because those ganks are stupid. Like unless you are one of those uninteractive mids who just waveclear in a second and then leave (Viktor etc.) it is just hell facing her. 

It's not even that she will outright kill you alone (though she can do that of course) it's just that her combo in lane provides so little counterplay. She can just poke and do a HUGE amount of damage then back off, and its back up in a few seconds. You can't really sustain through the damage that long and her mana pool will outlive your health (especially since her Ult is free) and even if it takes a few combos to lower your HP enough to all-in you or threaten the all-in, there's little you can do to prevent it. Not to mention Q-W procs thunderlords.

She is completely anti-fun. And her chain going invisible when she procs her passive is BS too.
{{champion:3}} {{champion:25}}
First zed, then yasuo, Now Leblanc, Boards is a joke.

> [{quoted}](name=NightmareAmazoX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IBIEArA3,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2016-08-12T14:25:18.362+0000)
>
> First zed, then yasuo, Now Leblanc, Boards is a joke.

you forgot Azir. Except poor Azir went down the drain after he got bandwagonned, the rest of the circlejerked champs are still free.

She's very outraging to play against yes ... but It feels like it is one of her design points. Being obnoxious and highly deceiving. It would be nice to see her more about deploying mind games rather than destroying the mental state of players by killing them in 0.75 sec

She doesnt do any more damage at lv3 with all spells hit than taliya, fizz, anivia, ekko, ahri, zyra.... Probably more. Possibly less skill shots than others, but for real the damage is not op. 

Save cc for hitting her mid dash. Like if you play ahri and charm her while she is dashing and her mark pop doesnt go off, plus you qw, you destroy her in the trade. Similar stuff exists with many other champs

I'm not really trying to prove anything here (I have no problem with LeBlanc) but for the sake of interest I decided to look up the lvl 3 damage of a few mid lane champions (mostly the ones you listed) to see how they stack up against LeBlanc, cos I'd be surprised if her damage was lower than most of them. Her damage does look higher because it's reliable, but it's also just really fucking high. So let's go:

LeBlanc full lvl 3 combo: 275 (+ 240% AP)
Taliyah: 400 (+ 240% AP) [I think... her E is kinda confusing. Obviously a literally perfect Taliyah trade is a pipedream though]
Anivia: 230 (+ 180% AP)
Ahri: 204 (+ 184% AP) [Slightly higher than it looks cos part of it is true damage]

Not gonna include Zyra, Fizz or Ekko because too much of their damage is variable (how many auto-attacks?) or %HP-based. I'll do some others instead.

Syndra: 200 (+ 195% AP)
Katarina: 155 (+ 115% AP) (+ 60% Bonus AD)
Vel'Koz: 274 (+ 180% AP) [Partly true damage obvs]

______________

So LeBlanc is pretty up there in terms of damage with basic spells, you're really looking at highly impractical damage like Taliyah getting a completely perfect combo and stuff like Zyra managing to hit you with a dozen plant autos before you catch up. Zed with a perfect shadow combo perhaps but I didn't want to do him because I'd have to take his passive into account.

As I said, I have no problem with LeBlanc and think she's fine. It's OK for her to do comparatively high damage. I was just interested in finding out if she did.

I once faced a LeBlenk. I had MR Glyphs, started Null-Magic, backed for Negatron and pots soon after.

It was hilarious to watch her try to deal damage.
But you invested so much in defenses, what did you do for your own damage?
{{champion:3}} .
Lane is a 1v1 situation, where she shines since she has mostly single target damage. Later game she'll fall off in terms of team contribution.

How Ironic it is that her main source of damage is AOE and yet she shines in 1v1 situations.

######Not disagreeing with you by the way just pointing out it's funny

Well, the main source of her damage is actually her single-target point-and-click Q's status effect being proc'd.
It's just most people proc it with the W since it's the easiest to do so with.
Wait what? Why is she getting reworked?
Cuz assassin reworks duh. People don't like playing vs her because they're somehow unable to walk backwards when she wants to qrw.

> [{quoted}](name=WingedWinter,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IBIEArA3,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2016-08-12T13:01:07.021+0000)
>
> Cuz assassin reworks duh. People don't like playing vs her because they're somehow unable to walk backwards when she wants to qrw.

Then what can they do besides completely ruining her by completely reworking her w into something else?
Admit she is to damn obnoxious right now and move on.
